title: doc/effective_go.html: unescaped character
body:
by **manlio.perillo**: 
There is a small typo in doc/effective_go.html document: an invalid unescaped `<`
character.

Patch is attached, against 062f1f0ea8ba+ revision.


Regards  Manlio Perillo
Attachments: 1. unescaped_char_in_effective_go.diff (277 bytes)
